link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/non-numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/nonNumeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: New Company registration number MUST be reported.
"Nombor pendaftaran syarikat baharu" MESTI dilaporkan
Name of reporting entity MUST be reported
Nama syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
Calendar year of annual return MUST be reported
Tahun kalendar penyata tahunan MESTI dilaporkan
Date of annual return MUST be reported
Tarikh penyata tahunan MESTI dilaporkan
Origin of company MUST be reported
Asal-usul syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
Status of company MUST be reported
Status syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
Type of company MUST be reported
Jenis syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
Type of submission MUST be reported
Jenis serahan MESTI dilaporkan
Disclosure whether company is preparing annual return for first time since incorporation MUST be reported.
Pendedahan sama ada syarikat sedang menyediakan penyata tahunan untuk kali pertama sejak pemerbadanan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure whether company is preparing annual return for first time since incorporation" MUST be "No"
"Pendedahan sama ada syarikat sedang menyediakan penyata tahunan untuk kali pertama sejak pemerbadanan" MESTILAH "Tidak"
Calender year of annual return should be more than or equal to 2017
Tahun kalendar penyata tahunan hendaklah lebih daripada atau sama dengan 2017
Date of annual return should be more than or equal to 31st Jan 2017
Tarikh penyata tahunan hendaklah lebih daripada atau sama dengan 31hb Jan 2017
Submission date must be more than Date of Annual Return (cannot submit earlier)
Tarikh serahan mestilah lebih daripada Tarikh Pulangan Tahunan (tidak boleh dihantar lebih awal)

va:valueAssertion.test: $V2 eq "Company limited by shares" or $V2 eq "Unlimited company" or $V2 eq "Company without shares"

gen:link.msg:message: If filers select "Origin of company" as "Incorporated outside Malaysia", THEN Type of company MUST be either "Company limited by shares" or "Unlimited company" or "Company without shares"

Jika pemfail memilih "Asal-usul syarikat" sebagai "Diperbadankan di luar Malaysia", KEMUDIAN Jenis syarikat MESTILAH sama ada "Syarikat terhad oleh saham" atau "Syarikat tanpa had" atau "Syarikat tanpa saham"
Type of company should not be "Company without shares" when Type of submission is AR4
Jenis syarikat tidak sepatutnya "Syarikat tanpa saham" apabila Jenis penyerahan adalah AR4
Application of submission MUST be reported
Permohonan serahan MESTI dilaporkan
When user selects "Application of submission" as "Rectification filing" THEN "Statutory Declaration for rectification" MUST be reported
Apabila pengguna memilih "Permohonan penyerahan" sebagai "Pemfailan pembetulan" KEMUDIAN "Akuan Berkanun untuk pembetulan" MESTI dilaporkan
"Statutory Declaration for rectification" should be more than or equal to "Date of annual return"
"Akuan Berkanun untuk pembetulan" hendaklah lebih daripada atau sama dengan "Tarikh penyata tahunan"
When user selects "Application of submission" as "Rectification filing with court order" or "Court order filing" THEN "Court Order reference number" MUST be reported
Apabila pengguna memilih "Permohonan serahan" sebagai "Pemfailan pembetulan dengan perintah mahkamah" atau "Pemfailan perintah mahkamah" KEMUDIAN "Nombor rujukan Perintah Mahkamah" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq "Rectification filing with court order" or $V1 eq "Court order filing"

gen:link.msg:message: When user selects Origin of company as Incorporated in Malaysia and Type of company as Company limited by shares or Unlimited company or Company limited by guarantee THEN Type of submission MUST be "AR4"

Apabila pengguna memilih Asal Syarikat sebagai Diperbadankan di Malaysia dan Jenis syarikat sebagai Syarikat terhad oleh saham atau syarikat tanpa had atau Syarikat Berhad Menurut Jaminan KEMUDIAN Jenis serahan MESTILAH "AR4"

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq "Incorporated in Malaysia" and $V2 eq "Company limited by shares" or $V2 eq "Unlimited company" or $V2 eq "Company limited by guarantee"

gen:link.msg:message: Name and version of software used to generate XBRL file MUST be reported.
Nama dan versi perisian yang digunakan untuk menjana fail XBRL MESTI dilaporkan.
Taxonomy version MUST be reported
Versi taksonomi MESTI dilaporkan
Submission date must be more than Date of Annual Return (cannot submit earlier)
Tarikh serahan mestilah lebih daripada Tarikh penyata Tahunan (tidak boleh dihantar lebih awal)
Kindly ensure "Status of company"is applicable as at Anniversary date.
Sila pastikan "Status syarikat" terpakai pada tarikh Ulang Tahun.
